mapper.insert: insert into Board (boardTitle, boardContent, memNickName ,memNumber) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},#{memNickName},#{memNumber})
mapper.update: update Board set boardTitle =#{boardTitle}, boardContent=#{boardContent} where boardNumber = #{boardNumber}
mapper.select: select * from Board where boardNumber > 0 order by boardNumber desc, boardDate desc
select * from Board where boardNumber > 0 order by boardNumber desc, boardDate desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from Board where boardNumber > 0 order by boardNumber desc, boardDate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(boardNumber) from Board where boardNumber > 0
